detailsData.title: Experienced Representation
detailsData.content: With over 30 years of experience, we have a strong record of favorable judgments in state and federal courts.

detailsData.title: Proactive Legal Approach
detailsData.content: We take charge of the conversation and find advantages that speed the issue to resolution.

detailsData.title: Responsive Service
detailsData.content: We provide proactive, responsive legal representation from the start of a transaction to final resolution.

address: 3840 Watt Ave., Bldg. A, Sacramento, CA 95821
subHeading: Solving the Problems That Keep You Up at Night
valueProp: Goodman Law Corporation is a Sacramento law firm providing legal services to business owners and professionals throughout the state. Our focus, and extensive expertise, is in the areas of professional liability and malpractice, real estate, business disputes, ethics, and employment.
CTA: Sign up to receive our free newsletter on the legal issues that matter most.
openHours: Hours may vary, contact for details
